comments.body: simplifying code review: these helper methods moved from the removed hostport files (see below). These were shared

`hostportManager.iptables` / `hostportSyncer.iptables` is specifically either an IPv4-only interface or an IPv6-only interface and maybe we should make sure it's the right one? (kubenet is the only user of this code in-tree, and it passes an IPv4-only interface, but I think it also only supports IPv4 pod IPs so that's ok)
I' ve added checks to verify that the pod IP and the iptables version are the same

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +154,158 @@			"-m", "comment", "--comment", fmt.Sprintf(`"%s hostport %d"`, podFullName, pm.HostPort),
			"-m", protocol, "-p", protocol,
			"-j", "DNAT", fmt.Sprintf("--to-destination=%s", hostPortBinding))
	}

comments.body: comment on the fact that this is safe for valid v4 IPs
